00027 /* Max line length we support in M3U files... should match MD TOC max */
00028 #define M3U_LINE_MAX    128
00029 
00030 static void handle_secure_cmd(usb_dev_handle* devh, int cmdid, int track)
00031 {
00032         unsigned int player_id;
00033         unsigned char ekb_head[] = {
00034                 0x01, 0xca, 0xbe, 0x07, 0x2c, 0x4d, 0xa7, 0xae,
00035                 0xf3, 0x6c, 0x8d, 0x73, 0xfa, 0x60, 0x2b, 0xd1};
00036         unsigned char ekb_body[] = {
00037                 0x0f, 0xf4, 0x7d, 0x45, 0x9c, 0x72, 0xda, 0x81,
00038                 0x85, 0x16, 0x9d, 0x73, 0x49, 0x00, 0xff, 0x6c,
00039                 0x6a, 0xb9, 0x61, 0x6b, 0x03, 0x04, 0xf9, 0xce};
00040         unsigned char rand_in[8], rand_out[8];
00041         unsigned char hash8[8];
00042         unsigned char hash32[32];
00043 
00044         switch (cmdid) {
00045         case 0x11:
00046                 if (netmd_secure_cmd_11(devh, &player_id) > 0) {
00047                         fprintf(stdout, "Player id = %04d\n", player_id);
00048                 }
00049                 break;
00050         case 0x12:
00051                 netmd_secure_cmd_12(devh, ekb_head, ekb_body);
00052                 break;
00053         case 0x20:
00054                 memset(rand_in, 0, sizeof(rand_in));
00055                 if (netmd_secure_cmd_20(devh, rand_in, rand_out) > 0) {
00056                         fprintf(stdout, "Random =\n");
00057                         print_hex(rand_out, sizeof(rand_out));
00058                 }
00059                 break;
00060         case 0x21:
00061                 netmd_secure_cmd_21(devh);
00062                 break;
00063         case 0x22:
00064                 memset(hash32, 0, sizeof(hash32));
00065                 netmd_secure_cmd_22(devh, hash32);
00066                 break;
00067         case 0x23:
00068                 if (netmd_secure_cmd_23(devh, track, hash8) > 0) {
00069                         fprintf(stdout, "Hash id of track %d =\n", track);
00070                         print_hex(hash8, sizeof(hash8));
00071                 }
00072                 break;
00073 /*case 0x28: TODO */
00074         case 0x40:
00075                 if (netmd_secure_cmd_40(devh, track, hash8) > 0) {
00076                         fprintf(stdout, "Signature of deleted track %d =\n", track);
00077                         print_hex(hash8, sizeof(hash8));
00078                 }                               
00079                 break;
00080         case 0x48:
00081                 memset(hash8, 0, sizeof(hash8));
00082                 if (netmd_secure_cmd_48(devh, track, hash8) > 0) {
00083                         fprintf(stdout, "Signature of downloaded track %d =\n", track);
00084                         print_hex(hash8, sizeof(hash8));
00085                 }                               
00086                 break;
00087         case 0x80:
00088                 netmd_secure_cmd_80(devh);
00089                 break;
00090         case 0x81:
00091                 netmd_secure_cmd_81(devh);
00092                 break;
00093         default:
00094                 fprintf(stderr, "unsupported secure command\n");
00095                 break;
00096         }
00097 }

00100 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00101 {
00102         struct usb_device* netmd;
00103         usb_dev_handle* devh;
00104         minidisc my_minidisc, *md = &my_minidisc;
00105         int i = 0;
00106         int j = 0;
00107         char name[16];
00108         int     cmdid, track;
00109 
00110         netmd = netmd_init();
00111 
00112         printf("\n\n");
00113         if(!netmd)
00114         {
00115                 printf( "No NetMD devices detected.\n" );
00116                 return -1;
00117         }
00118 
00119         printf("Found a NetMD device!\n");
00120 
00121         devh = netmd_open(netmd);
00122         if(!devh)
00123         {
00124                 printf("Error opening netmd\n%s\n", strerror(errno));
00125                 return -1;
00126         }
00127 
00128         if(!netmd_get_devname(devh, name, 16))
00129         {
00130                 printf("Could not get device name\n");
00131                 return -1;
00132         }
00133         printf("%s\n", name);
00134 
00135         netmd_initialize_disc_info(devh, md);
00136         printf("Disc Title: %s\n\n", md->groups[0].name);
00137 
00138         if(argc > 1)
00139         {
00140                 if(strcmp("rename", argv[1]) == 0)
00141                 {
00142                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00143                         netmd_set_title(devh, i, argv[3], strlen(argv[3]));
00144                 }
00145                 else if(strcmp("move", argv[1]) == 0)
00146                 {
00147                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00148                         j = strtol(argv[3], NULL, 10);
00149                         netmd_move_track(devh, i, j);
00150                 }
00151                 else if(strcmp("groupmove", argv[1]) == 0)
00152                 {
00153                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00154                         j = strtol(argv[3], NULL, 10);
00155                         netmd_move_group(devh, md, j, i);
00156                 }
00157                 else if(strcmp("write", argv[1]) == 0)
00158                 {
00159                         if(netmd_write_track(devh, argv[2]) < 0)
00160                         {
00161                                 fprintf(stderr, "Error writing track %i\n", errno);
00162                         }
00163                 }
00164                 else if(strcmp("newgroup", argv[1]) == 0)
00165                 {
00166                         netmd_create_group(devh, argv[2]);
00167                 }
00168                 else if(strcmp("group", argv[1]) == 0)
00169                 {
00170                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00171                         j = strtol(argv[3], NULL, 10);
00172                         if(!netmd_put_track_in_group(devh, md, i, j))
00173                         {
00174                                 printf("Something screwy happened\n");
00175                         }
00176                 }
00177                 else if(strcmp("retitle", argv[1]) == 0)
00178                 {
00179                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00180                         netmd_set_group_title(devh, md, i, argv[3]);
00181                 }
00182                 else if(strcmp("writeheader", argv[1]) == 0)
00183                 {
00184                         /* edit group cause my logic fucked it up. */
00185                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00186                         md->groups[i].start = strtol(argv[3], NULL, 10);
00187                         md->groups[i].finish = strtol(argv[4], NULL, 10);
00188                         netmd_write_disc_header(devh, md);
00189                 }
00190                 else if(strcmp("play", argv[1]) == 0)
00191                 {
00192                         if( argc > 2 ) {
00193                                 i = strtol(argv[2],NULL, 10);
00194                                 netmd_set_track( devh, i );
00195                         }
00196                         netmd_play(devh);
00197                 }
00198                 else if(strcmp("stop", argv[1]) == 0)
00199                 {
00200                         netmd_stop(devh);
00201                 }
00202                 else if(strcmp("pause", argv[1]) == 0)
00203                 {
00204                         netmd_pause(devh);
00205                 }
00206                 else if(strcmp("fforward", argv[1]) == 0)
00207                 {
00208                         netmd_fast_forward(devh);
00209                 }
00210                 else if(strcmp("rewind", argv[1]) == 0)
00211                 {
00212                         netmd_rewind(devh);
00213                 }
00214                 else if(strcmp("test", argv[1]) == 0)
00215                 {
00216                         test(devh);
00217                 }
00218                 else if(strcmp("m3uimport", argv[1]) == 0)
00219                 {
00220                         import_m3u_playlist(devh, argv[2]);
00221                 }
00222                 else if(strcmp("delete", argv[1]) == 0)
00223                 {
00224                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00225                         netmd_delete_track(devh, i);
00226                 }
00227                 else if(strcmp("deletegroup", argv[1]) == 0)
00228                 {
00229                         i = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 10);
00230                         netmd_delete_group(devh, md, i);
00231                 }
00232                 else if(strcmp("status", argv[1]) == 0) {
00233                         print_current_track_info(devh);
00234                 }
00235                 else if (strcmp("secure", argv[1]) == 0) {
00236                         cmdid = strtol(argv[2], NULL, 16);
00237                         track = 0;
00238                         if (argc > 3) {
00239                                 track = strtol(argv[3], NULL, 10);
00240                         }                       
00241                         handle_secure_cmd(devh, cmdid, track);
00242                 }
00243                 else if(strcmp("help", argv[1]) == 0)
00244                 {
00245                         print_syntax();
00246                 }
00247                 else
00248                 {
00249                         print_disc_info(devh, md);
00250                         print_syntax();
00251                 }
00252         }
00253         else
00254                 print_disc_info(devh, md);
00255 
00256         netmd_clean_disc_info(md);
00257         netmd_clean(devh);
00258 
00259         return 0;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void print_current_track_info(usb_dev_handle* devh) {
00263         float f = 0;
00264         int i = 0;
00265         int size = 0;
00266         char buffer[256];
00267 
00268 
00269         f = netmd_get_playback_position(devh);
00270         i = netmd_get_current_track(devh);
00271 
00272         size = netmd_request_title(devh, i, buffer, 256);
00273 
00274         if(size < 0)
00275         {
00276                 printf("something really really nasty just happened.");
00277         }
00278         else {
00279                 printf("Current track: %s \n", buffer);
00280         }
00281 
00282         printf("Current playback position: %f \n", f);
00283 
00284 }
00285 
00286 void print_disc_info(usb_dev_handle* devh, minidisc* md)
00287 {
00288         int i = 0;
00289         int size = 1;
00290         int g, group = 0, lastgroup = 0;
00291         unsigned char codec_id, bitrate_id;
00292         char *name, buffer[256];
00293         struct netmd_track time;
00294         struct netmd_pair const *codec, *bitrate;
00295 
00296         codec = bitrate = 0;
00297 
00298         for(i = 0; size >= 0; i++)
00299         {
00300                 size = netmd_request_title(devh, i, buffer, 256);
00301 
00302                 if(size < 0)
00303                 {
00304                         break;
00305                 }
00306 
00307                 /* Figure out which group this track is in */
00308                 for( group = 0, g = 1; g < md->group_count; g++ )
00309                 {
00310                         if( (md->groups[g].start <= i+1) && (md->groups[g].finish >= i+1 ))
00311                         {
00312                                 group = g;
00313                                 break;
00314                         }
00315                 }
00316                 /* Different to the last group? */
00317                 if( group != lastgroup )
00318                 {
00319                         lastgroup = group;
00320                         if( group )                     /* Group 0 is 'no group' */
00321                         {
00322                                 printf("Group: %s\n", md->groups[group].name);
00323                         }
00324                 }
00325                 /* Indent tracks which are in a group */
00326                 if( group )
00327                 {
00328                         printf("  ");
00329                 }
00330 
00331                 netmd_request_track_time(devh, i, &time);
00332                 netmd_request_track_codec(devh, i, &codec_id);
00333                 netmd_request_track_bitrate(devh, i, &bitrate_id);
00334 
00335                 codec = find_pair(codec_id, codecs);
00336                 bitrate = find_pair(bitrate_id, bitrates);
00337 
00338                 /* Skip 'LP:' prefix... the codec type shows up in the list anyway*/
00339                 if( strncmp( buffer, "LP:", 3 ))
00340                 {
00341                         name = buffer;
00342                 }
00343                 else
00344                 {
00345                         name = buffer + 3;
00346                 }
00347 
00348                 printf("Track %2i: %-6s %6s - %02i:%02i:%02i - %s\n",
00349                            i, codec->name, bitrate->name, time.minute,
00350                            time.second, time.tenth, name);
00351         }
00352 
00353         /* XXX - This needs a rethink with the above method */
00354         /* groups may not have tracks, print the rest. */
00355         printf("\n--Empty Groups--\n");
00356         for(group=1; group < md->group_count; group++)
00357         {
00358                 if(md->groups[group].start == 0 && md->groups[group].finish == 0) {
00359                         printf("Group: %s\n", md->groups[group].name);
00360                 }
00361 
00362         }
00363 
00364         printf("\n\n");
00365 }
00366 
00367 void import_m3u_playlist(usb_dev_handle* devh, const char *file)
00368 {
00369     FILE *fp;
00370     char buffer[M3U_LINE_MAX + 1];
00371     char *s;
00372     int track, discard;
00373 
00374     if( file == NULL )
00375     {
00376                 printf( "No filename specified\n" );
00377                 print_syntax();
00378                 return;
00379     }
00380 
00381     if( (fp = fopen( file, "r" )) == NULL )
00382     {
00383                 printf( "Unable to open file %s: %s\n", file, strerror( errno ));
00384                 return;
00385     }
00386 
00387     if( ! fgets( buffer, M3U_LINE_MAX, fp )) {
00388                 printf( "File Read error\n" );
00389                 return;
00390     }
00391     if( strcmp( buffer, "#EXTM3U\n" )) {
00392                 printf( "Invalid M3U playlist\n" );
00393                 return;
00394     }
00395 
00396     track = 0;
00397     discard = 0;
00398     while( fgets( buffer, M3U_LINE_MAX, fp) != NULL ) {
00399                 /* Chomp newlines */
00400                 s = strchr( buffer, '\n' );
00401                 if( s )
00402                         *s = '\0';
00403 
00404                 if( buffer[0] == '#' )
00405                 {
00406                         /* comment, ext3inf etc... we only care about ext3inf */
00407                         if( strncmp( buffer, "#EXTINF:", 8 ))
00408                         {
00409                                 printf( "Skip: %s\n", buffer );
00410                         }
00411                         else
00412                         {
00413                                 s = strchr( buffer, ',' );
00414                                 if( !s )
00415                                 {
00416                                         printf( "M3U Syntax error! %s\n", buffer );
00417                                 }
00418                                 else
00419                                 {
00420                                         s++;
00421                                         printf( "Title track %d - %s\n", track, s );
00422                                         netmd_set_title(devh, track, s, strlen( s )); /* XXX Handle errors */
00423                                         discard = 1;    /* don't fallback to titling by filename */
00424                                 }
00425                         }
00426                 }
00427                 else
00428                 {
00429                         /* Filename line */
00430                         if( discard )
00431                         {
00432                                 /* printf( "Discard: %s\n", buffer ); */
00433                                 discard = 0;
00434                         }
00435                         else
00436                         {
00437                                 /* Try and generate a title from the track name */
00438                                 s = strrchr( buffer, '.' ); /* Isolate extension */
00439                                 if( s )
00440                                         *s = 0;
00441                                 s = strrchr( buffer, '/' ); /* Isolate basename */
00442                                 if( !s )
00443                                         s = strrchr( buffer, '\\' ); /* Handle DOS paths? */
00444                                 if( !s )
00445                                         s = buffer;
00446                                 else
00447                                         s++;
00448 
00449                                 printf( "Title track %d - %s\n", track, s );
00450                                 netmd_set_title(devh, track, s, strlen( s )); /* XXX Handle errors */
00451                         }
00452                         track++;
00453                 }
00454     }
00455 }

00460 void print_syntax()
00461 {
00462         printf("\nNetMD test suite usage syntax\n");
00463         printf("rename # <string> - rename track # to <string> track numbers are off by one (ie track 1 is 0)\n");
00464         printf("move #1 #2 - make track #1 track #2\n");
00465         printf("groupmove #1 #2 - make group #1 start at track #2 !BUGGY!\n");
00466         printf("deletegroup #1 - delete a group, but not the tracks in it\n");
00467         printf("write <string> - write omg file to netmd unit !DOES NOT WORK!\n");
00468         printf("group #1 #2 - Stick track #1 into group #2\n");
00469         printf("retitle #1 <string> - rename group number #1 to <string>\n");
00470         printf("play #1 - play track #\n");
00471         printf("fforward - start fast forwarding\n");
00472         printf("rewind - start rewinding\n");
00473         printf("pause - pause the unit\n");
00474         printf("stop - stop the unit\n");
00475         printf("delete #1 - delete track\n");
00476         printf("m3uimport - import playlist - and title current disc using it.\n");
00477         printf("newgroup <string> - create a new group named <string>\n");
00478         printf("secure #1 #2 - execute secure command #1 on track #2 (where applicable)\n");
00479         printf("  --- general ---\n");
00480         printf("  0x80 = start secure session\n");
00481         printf("  0x11 = get player id\n");
00482         printf("  0x12 = send ekb\n");
00483         printf("  0x20 = exchange randoms\n");
00484         printf("  0x21 = discard randoms\n");
00485         printf("  0x81 = end secure session\n");
00486         printf("  --- check-out ---\n");
00487         printf("  0x22 = submit 32-byte hash\n");
00488         printf("  0x28 = prepare download\n");
00489         printf("  0x48 = verify downloaded track #\n");
00490         printf("  --- check-in ---\n");
00491         printf("  0x23 = get hash id for track #\n");
00492         printf("  0x40 = secure delete track #\n");
00493         printf("help - print this stuff\n");
00494 }
